participant_1.background:
I once lost my favorite necklace, which was a gift from my grandmother.
I enjoy cooking for my beloved cat and dog.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
i am a drummer in an indie band.
i love the beach.

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive and encouraging of my passion for designer French fries.
I enjoy listening to Nightwish to remind myself that I can accomplish anything if I set my mind to it.
I had to eat an entire plate of broccoli once.
i work in marketing , and i love it.
I maintained a healthy weight last year.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing great! What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to play music, cook, and go to the beach.
Oh wow, those are all great things to do! I love to cook too, and I enjoy going to the beach as well.
That's awesome! We should cook together sometime.
That sounds like a great idea! I would love to cook with you.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I love to play all sorts of music, but my favorite is probably rock music.
Oh wow, that's great! I love rock music too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love a lot of bands, but my favorites are probably Nightwish, Metallica, and Guns N' Roses.
Those are all great bands! I love Nightwish too.
Awesome! We should definitely cook and listen to music together sometime.
That sounds like a great plan! I'm looking forward to it.
